title: Australia's Secret Heroes
brief_description: Australia’s Secret Heroes uncovers a dramatic forgotten episode of Australia’s World War II involvement. Combining penetrating big-picture history of the Pacific war with gripping personal narrative, it charts the journey of Z Special, a covert jungle warfare unit and forerunner of today’s special force units.

constellations_other.name: Australia and WW2
constellations_other.description: A constellation exploring representations of Australians during World War 2.
